description:
Gintoki is reading a manga magazine on the train and harshly criticizes the Gintaman manga. The editor in charge of Gintaman happens to be sitting next to him… Furious at Gintoki`s insults, he explodes challenging Gintoki to try being an editor and lamenting about his terrible workplace. Gintoki accepts and becomes the editor in charge of Gintaman. They visit the manga author’s home and Gintoki sets out to mentor them on how to make Gintaman into a better manga…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Those Who Are Disliked Are Always Adorable
好かれないものほど愛おしい
